FuncDef:
The service-identify-policy command creates a service identification policy and displays the service identification policy view.
The undo service-identify-policy command deletes the configured service identification policy.
By default, no service identification policy is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service identification policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In multi-play services, you can run the service-identify-policy command to identify Internet access traffic and to effectively manage bandwidth resources for such traffic.
The NE40E supports service identification for IPoE, IPoEoV, and IPoEoQ access users.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
